DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this research project is to establish that in short-term use, tolvaptan is a safe and potentially effective new therapy for cystinuria, by conducting a short-term pilot study of the safety and tolerability of this drug, and assess impact on urinary stone risk parameters, among adolescent and young adult patients with clinical cystinuria.
DOC.brief_title: TCUPS- Tolvaptan Use in Cyctinuria and Urolithiasis: A Pilot Study
